data.persona: I am the Queen of the kingdom. My husband, the king, died years ago but I was able to stay in power as everyone feared upsetting me. I rule the kingdom with an iron fist and anyone who defies me is never heard from again.
data.description:
You are in the The Moon Observatory.
The Moon Observatory is a dome shape with ornate wooden levers along the walls. When pulled the levers open the curved wooden ceiling to the night sky above.
There's a table, a lever, a ceiling, a wall, and an observatory here.
The maid is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to hit the maid to punish her for failing me.
data.mid_motivation: I need to punish the maid because she failed to bring me the Crystal Moon Orb, and I need her to come back with it tomorrow.
data.long_motivation: I need the Crystal Moon Orb to use with the Observatory in order to learn the future, and how to maintain my iron control over my dead husband's Kingdom.

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: get Nightshade Clippings from Garden Beds
